case_name: Theodore D'Apuzzo, P.A. v. United States

docket_entries.description: MISCELLANEOUS CASE DOCKETED. Petition for permission to appeal pursuant to 23(f) filed by Petitioner Theodore D'Apuzzo, P.A.. Served 04/24/2018 email - Attorney for Respondents: Smachetti, U.S. Attorney Service - Southern District of Florida; US mail - Attorney for Respondent: Welch.
APPEARANCE of Counsel Form filed by Attorney Nicole Giuliano for Petitioner Theodore D'Apuzzo, P.A. in 18-90014, Attorney Morgan L. Weinstein for Petitioner Theodore D'Apuzzo, P.A. in 18-90014.

Certificate of Interested Persons and Corporate Disclosure Statement filed by Attorney Nicole Giuliano for Petitioner Theodore D'Apuzzo, P.A.. On the same day the CIP is served, the party filing it must also complete the court's web-based stock ticker symbol certificate at the link here http://www.ca11.uscourts.gov/web-based-cip or on the court's website. See 11th Cir. R. 26.1-2(b). (ECF: Nicole Giuliano)
APPEARANCE of Counsel Form filed by Joshua M. Salzman for United States of America (ECF: Joshua Salzman)
TIME SENSITIVE MOTION for extension of time to file response to motion to 05/25/2018 filed by USA. Motion is Unopposed. [8442478-1] (ECF: Joshua Salzman)
APPEARANCE of Counsel Form filed by Charles W. Scarborough representing respondent (ECF: Charles Scarborough)
